Name: Crew Quarters
Description: Provides enough crew for a 200kT ship.

Name: Ion Engine
Description: Provides enough thrust for a 200kT ship to move at speed 1.

Name: Contra-Terrene Engine
Description: Provides enough thrust for a 300kT ship to move at speed 1.

Name: Jacketed-Photon Engine
Description: Provides enough thrust for a 400kT ship to move at speed 1.

Name: Quantum Engine
Description: Provides enough thrust for a 500kT ship to move at speed 1.

Name: Depleted Uranium Cannon
Description: Projectile weapon which fires dense metallic slugs.

Name: Anti-Proton Beam
Description: Particle beam weapon which fires a coherent stream of anti-protons.

Name: Ripper Beam
Description: Short range graviton beam which tears enemy ships apart.

Name: Wave Motion Gun
Description: Long range subspace distortion beam. Very powerful, but slow to reload.

Name: Capital Ship Missile
Description: Long range nuclear missile. Slow to reload. Evaded using point-defense instead of ECM.

Name: Plasma Missile
Description: Long range plasma missile. Slow to reload. Evaded using point-defense instead of ECM.

Name: ECM
Description: Gives a 20% chance to evade non-missile weapons. Multiple ECM components will apply this chance consecutively.

Name: Point Defense Cannon
Description: Gives a 20% chance to shoot down missile weapons. Multiple PD components will apply this chance consecutively.

Name: Armor
Description: Tough but otherwise inert metallic reinforcements to a ship's superstructure.

Name: Emissive Armor
Description: Specialized armor which bleeds off energy into space, reducing the damage of incoming attacks by up to 10 points.

Name: Shield Generator
Description: Generates a protective energy barrier around a ship which must be dissipated before the ship can be damaged.
